definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Their new accounting system will help clip the wings of any would-be embezzlers.
sentences.chinese: 他们的新会计制度有助于杜绝可能发生的贪污行为。

sentences.english: Obtain and review the original vouchers in accordance with the accounting system.
sentences.chinese: 取得并按会计制度规定审核原始凭证。

sentences.english: Establish a unified accounting system and a modern enterprise management throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 建立全国统一的会计制度和现代企业管理制度。

sentences.english: Journal section is a double entry accounting system which is the heart of RFC.
sentences.chinese: 杂志部分是复式的会计制度，把RFC的核心。

sentences.english: There seems to be a bug in the new accounting system.
sentences.chinese: 看来新的会计制度存在一些小问题。

sentences.english: Balance of Payments Statements are compiled on a double-entry system of accounting .
sentences.chinese: 收支平衡表应按照复式会计制度编制。

sentences.english: First, the Human Recourses' Equity Accounting system is designed theoretically.
sentences.chinese: 首先，从理论上对人力资源权益会计制度进行设计。

sentences.english: Each times accounting system has its unique individuality and consummates day by day.
sentences.chinese: 每个时期的会计制度都有其独特的个性并日趋完善。

sentences.english: Ensure bookkeeping, accounting and reporting is made in accordance with applicable accounting regulations of P. R. C.
sentences.chinese: 确保符合中国现行法律，规章和会计制度，规定。

sentences.english: Article 3 Accounting systems of enterprises shall be formulated in compliance with these Criteria.
sentences.chinese: 第三条制定企业会计制度理卖遵照来源基本则。

definition: to set aside/to make provision for (capital requirements)
